dict.acceptation: 货摊；托辞；畜栏；（房间内的）小隔间；

sent.orig: We asked them to solve the problem, but they stall for time.
sent.trans: 我们要求他们解决问题，但他们总是拖着。

sent.orig: The shoppers walk hesitantly from one stall to the next, discovering what each shop sells.
sent.trans: 买东西的人从一个摊位寻寻觅觅到另一个摊位，瞧瞧每处都卖些什么。

sent.orig: You may feel the canopy start to drop back as it enters a stall.
sent.trans: 你可能感觉这伞体开始后甩，好像进入失速。

sent.orig: Credo: I will return with help! You stall him until then!
sent.trans: 我会回来协助的！你先在这里拖住他。

sent.orig: The light was stall on in Tigress' room and at the sight he stopped dead.
sent.trans: 虎姑娘屋中的灯还亮着呢。一见这个灯亮，祥子猛的木在那里。
